Package jade.core.security.authentication

Interface Summary
JADEUserAuthenticator The JADEUserAuthenticator interface represents the entity that takes as input a couple: username/password and must provide: - the JADEPrincipal associated (if present, also with SDSIName) - and Credentials (if any) owned by that user at start-up time.
 

Class Summary
GroupCertificate  
JadeCallbackHandler Instantiation of a CallbackHandler to accept username and password from a UserAuthenticator.
JadeDialogCallbackHandler  
JadeTextCallbackHandler Prompts and reads from the command line for answers to authentication questions.
JADEUserAuthenticatorImpl JADEUserAuthenticatorImpl is the entity that takes as input a couple: username/password and provides: - the JADEPrincipal associated (if present, also with SDSIName) - and Credentials (if any) owned by that user at start-up time.
NameCertificate  
OwnershipCertificate  
RemoteUserAuthenticator Uses specified CallBackHandler to gather userName and userPassword For use with remote containers where necessary to gather user/pass information, but authenticate in Main container.
SimpleLoginModule This LoginModule imports a simple userName and userPassword and associates them with the current Subject.
SimplePrincipal  
UserAuthenticator  
UserPassCredential
